data.title: Housing Resources : News & Events : Aster Aging, Inc.
data.text:
HOUSING RESOURCES

Aster Aging is a partner in a pilot home-share program and two independent living communities in the East Valley. These resources work to ensure older adults are supported to remain independent as they age.

East Valley Senior Home Sharing Program

Senior Home Sharing connects pairs of older adults to share living space and expenses. We conduct an intensive assessment and on-boarding with applicants including background checks and verification of finances for your safety and security. We introduce potential roommates to ensure compatibility. We provide post move-in services such as problem solving and conflict resolution as needed. We also offer a full array of wrap-around supports including access to benefits, financial assistance, transportation resources and other ongoing resources. If you are looking for safe, affordable housing options or you have more house than you need and want to offset the increasing cost of living, contact us today!

evseniorhomesharing.org

Discovery Point

Discovery Point is a 183-unit independent living senior housing complex providing an environment that encourages health, wellness, friendship, and a strong connection to a supportive community for residents 55 years and above. Discovery Point provides a variety of services, like meal preparation, home maintenance, transportation and housekeeping. Additionally, the community provides many activities like exercise classes, cultural events, weekly outings to shopping and entertainment destinations and much more!

discoverypointretirement.com
